extension.description:
This Addon can view TV Shows, upcoming episodes and history events from your Sick Beard setup.
Sick Beard is a automated TV download manager tool available from: http://www.sickbeard.com
Easy way to set the API Key In Sick Beard enable the API on the General config page Open the Addon Settings file using notepad c:\Users\[user]\AppData\Roaming \XBMC\userdata\addon_data\plugin.video.sbview\settings.xml Past the API Key into the value field of setting with id="guid"
